title: Evidence-Based Practice Competency Enhancement Program Based on Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing skills and basic pathology knowledge
context.additional_context: Supplemental learning materials available via smartphones, with simulation laboratory facilities.

learning_goals: Learners assess patient conditions and develop intervention plans with over 80% accuracy in simulation environments reflecting real clinical cases.
Autonomously design and execute three or more team-based simulation projects following the CDIO model phases
Apply the Evidence-Based Practice (EBP) process to ensure over 90% of learners integrate the latest research findings in clinical decision-making
Through reflective journaling, learners self-assess and develop improvement plans at least four times independently

resources: Flipcharts and markers for team activities
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
